name: Out Of Sight, Out Of Mind (jacjson)
name_original: Out Of Sight, Out Of Mind (jacjson)
description:
Created for the 2022.1 Brackey's Game Jam.

You are a ball. You are always bouncing, as balls do. The ground beneath your feet - er, head? - only exists when you look at it. There could be a deeper narrative to this story, but there isn't.

Music credits: Fireteko
